de.japi.components

Class Japi2InternalFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JInternalFrame
            • de.japi.components.Japi2InternalFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Japi2InternalFrame
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
    An extended version of the JFrame that adds support for settings Insets since this is required by JAPI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getInsets

        public final java.awt.Insets getInsets()
        Warning: this method should not be used and is reserved for the SWING system. Use instead getInsetsReal().
        Overrides:
        getInsets in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Returns:
        the Insets for the SWING system.

      • getInsetsReal

        public final java.awt.Insets getInsetsReal()
        Returns the "real" Insets of this frame set by the corresponding method setInsets(java.awt.Insets).
        Returns:
        the Insets, never null.

      • setInsets

        public final void setInsets(java.awt.Insets insets)
        Sets the Insets of this frame by creating an empty border with the specified thickness due to the fact that Insets is not (directly) supported by SWING.
        Parameters:
        insets - the Insets to set or null to clear the active Insets.
